description: The Nishiki Gawa Japanese Maple is a truly special tree. Its ornamental leaves, comprised of striking shades of pink and cream, create a stunning centrepiece for any garden. Its unique foliage pattern allows it to capture light, transforming the landscape with ever-shifting shapes of orange and red in autumn. With its moderate growth rate, this stunning tree is an ideal choice for those who want an impressive focal point in the garden. Hardy and versatile, the Nishiki Gawa Japanese Maple is undeniably eye-catching.
